title: The Best of the Big Gig (Captioned)
brief_description: Madness, mayhem and tons of laughs from the infamous Big Gig team, with all the best bits taken from their first series and cleverly put together on one video. Hosted by Wendy Harmer and including such favourites as Glynn Nicholas, Jean Kitson, The Empty Pockets, Anthony Ackroyd and the Doug Anthony Allstars.
